title: Pompeo Says State Department Has Responded to Congressional Subpoena
text:
ATHENS—Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said the State Department has sent Congress a letter in response to a subpoena for documents related to the House impeachment inquiry, and said it was clear to him the process was politically motivated.

Mr. Pompeo said at a news conference in Athens on Saturday that the letter was delivered Friday night. He faced a Friday deadline to turn over documents pertaining to State Department dealings with Rudy Giuliani, President Trump’s personal lawyer, and other matters related to the July...
description: Mike Pompeo said the State Department has sent Congress a letter in response to a subpoena for documents relating to the House impeachment inquiry, continuing the Trump administration’s resistance to the probe.
